title: Online Graduate School Learning Skills Application Course: Mathematical Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary mathematics education experience and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for in-service mathematics teachers to acquire immediately applicable learning techniques in the workplace. Requires mobile-optimized content and a real-time feedback system

learning_goals: Learners must be able to select and utilize at least three digital tools for mobile-based mathematics education design
Learners must be able to build and apply a peer feedback system through community-based collaborative learning
Learners possess the competency to analyze microlearning content and reorganize it according to their educational context

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
